item.title: An Overview Of My Network
item.description: WAN Network Architecture & Diagram by Usman. See blog.usman.network for more info on the OSPF, BGP and VPN setup. ** My Network Infrastructure Breakdown:** My network consists of a Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X & a Cisco Catalyst switch. Wireguard is the VPN tunneling protocol used to connect external devices to the network. Additional Info My Home LAN Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X - erx.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Zahid and I’m a 2nd year undegraduate student studying Computer Science @ Brunel University London. After I graduate I’m aspiring to be a Network Architect.
